title: Python for Everybody
description: Learn to Program and Analyze Data with Python. Develop programs to gather, clean, analyze, and visualize data.
lengthDescription: Get in-depth knowledge of a subject.

title: Foundations of Project Management
description: Upgrade yourself with these fundamental skills to manage projects.

title: Vital Signs: Understanding What the Body Is Telling Us
description: Explore the anatomy and physiology underlying the vital signs so that you will develop a systematic, integrated understanding of how the body functions.

title: Introductory Human Physiology
description: Discover the fascinating world of human physiology and learn about the body's organ systems, their functions, and how they maintain health.

title: Introduction to Social Psychology
description: Learn the classic and contemporary social psychology , covering topics such as decision making, persuasion, and factors that promote health and well-being.

title: Machine Learning
description: Build Intelligent Applications. Master machine learning fundamentals in four hands-on courses.

title: Astronomy: Exploring Time and Space
description: Learn more about modern astronomy and get up to date on the most recent astronomical discoveries without prior knowledge in science.

title: Financial Markets
description: Introduction to risk management and behavioral finance principles to understand the real-world functioning of securities, insurance, and banking industries.
